code: import React,{useState}from"react";import api from"../api/api";import bgImage from"../assets/bg.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Login(_ref){let{onLogin,switchToRegister}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const handleLogin=async()=>{try{const res=await api.post("/login",{username,password});localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);onLogin();}catch(_unused){alert("Invalid credentials");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-left",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(bgImage,")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Dataroom"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Drop your files securely"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"auth-title",children:"Login Here!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),className:"auth-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Password",type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"auth-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,className:"auth-btn",children:"LOGIN \u2192"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"auth-footer",children:["Don\u2019t have an account?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:switchToRegister,className:"auth-link",children:"Register"})]})]})})]});}
